CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Sales_Outcome__c,'Won'), OR( ISPICKVAL(Forecast_Category__c,'Booked'), ISPICKVAL(Forecast_Category__c,'Secure'), ISPICKVAL(Forecast_Category__c,'Risk'), ISPICKVAL(Forecast_Category__c,'Upside'), ISPICKVAL(Forecast_Category__c,'RoP') ) ), OIF_Value_EUR__c, IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Sales_Outcome__c,'Cancelled by Customer'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Sales_Outcome__c,'Withdrawn by Nokia'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Sales_Outcome__c,'Lost to Competitor') ), OIF_Value_EUR__c ,0 ) )
CustomField.label: Total Decided OIF Value EUR
